bach_open_taxonomy.ObjectivStack.get_from_context_with_type_series¶

ObjectivStack.get_from_context_with_type_series(type, key, dtype='string')[source]¶

Returns the value of key from the first context in an Objectiv stack where _type matches type.

Parameters

  • type (str) – the _type to search for in the contexts of the stack.

  • key (str) – the value of the key to return of the context with matching type.

  • dtype – the dtype of the series to return.

Returns

a series of type dtype
